item.description:
HI North Shore puggers-

Ready for FUN FUN FUN????? The nice weather is slipping away; so dont miss this meetup!

Please come to a pug meet up at 73 Valley Street, Salem, MA 01970.

We have a huge fenced in yard so you don't have to worry about letting the puggies off leash. There is plenty of parking on the street and the side streets too. All members are welcome if weather permitting. Hope to see you then!

Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Alissa & Buster :)

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Pug September Meetup
